Name: Creating online applications for ambulance call reports.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating online applications for ambulance call reports
BodyName: Committee on Fire and Criminal Justice Services

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Fire and Criminal Justice Services
This Introduction was Filed (End of Session)

Summary: This bill would require the Fire Department of the City of New York to accept applications for ambulance call reports online.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      Section 1.  Chapter 1 of title 15 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 15-131 to read as follows:   

	� 15-131 Online applications for ambulance call reports. The department shall make all components of applications for ambulance call reports, prehospital care reports, or any substantially similar report available for online submission. Nothing in this section shall prevent the department from taking reasonable steps to verify the identity of any person submitting such applications. 
      � 2. This local law takes effect 6 months after it becomes law.
LS # 9012
BC
12/22/2016
